Description: Securely take payments everywhere with a single platform.
Name: Squareup

Methods.Name: Get New And Updated Customers
Methods.Description: Get all customers who were added or updated after the last run time.

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Update an existing customer.

Methods.Name: Create Customer
Methods.Description: Create a new customer.

Methods.Name: Delete Customer
Methods.Description: Delete an existing customer.

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: Get a list of all customers.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Retrieve a single customer by their ID.

Methods.Name: List Orders By Location
Methods.Description: Get a list of all orders for a location or all orders of a given customer.

Methods.Name: Get New Orders By Location
Methods.Description: Get a list of all orders for a location after the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Orders By Date Range
Methods.Description: Get a list of all orders for a location from the specified date range.

Methods.Name: List Locations
Methods.Description: Get a list of all locations.

Methods.Name: Get Payment
Methods.Description: Retrieves details for a specific payment.

Methods.Name: List Payments
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of payments taken by the account making the request.

Methods.Name: List New Payments by Location
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of payments taken since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Payments by Location
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of payments taken at a particular location.

Methods.Name: Get Employee
Methods.Description: Get a single employees by ID.

Methods.Name: List Employees
Methods.Description: Get a list of all employees.

Methods.Name: List Transactions By Location
Methods.Description: Get a list of all transactions.

Methods.Name: List Refunds By Location
Methods.Description: Get a list of all refunds for a location.

Methods.Name: Get New Refunds By Location.
Methods.Description: Get a list of all refunds made after the last run time for a given location.

Methods.Name: Get New Transactions By Location.
Methods.Description: Get a list of all transactions made after the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Refunds
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of refunds made by the account making the request.

Methods.Name: List New Refunds by Location
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of refunds made at a particular location since last run.

Methods.Name: List Refunds by Location
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of refunds made at a particular location.
